resources.string: This app lets you log data to and download data from multiple Movesense devices. First scan for Movesense Bluetooth devices and then tap to connect to a device. DataLogger view will open when a connection is established.\n\nNOTE: Re-scanning will disconnect connected devices. They will continue logging while disconnected.
Here you can start and stop logging of resource(s) and list Logbook entries on this device. Tap an entry to get the log content as a raw SBEM or formatted JSON file.
